{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":36221,"originalJapaneseLine":"　現在、今以てなお、戦力差は圧倒的です。","translatedEnglishLine":"Currently, even now, the difference in military strength is overwhelming."},{"lineNumber":36222,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここが無事であっても、それ以外の国々は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if this place remains safe, other countries..."},{"lineNumber":36223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":36224,"originalJapaneseLine":"一瞬軽くなった空気が、また地に沈んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"The atmosphere, which had briefly lightened, sank back down again."},{"lineNumber":36225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人レッドアイによりランス城は陥落し、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Red Eye caused Rance Castle to fall,"},{"lineNumber":36226,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この砦への撤退を余儀なくされましたが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and we were forced to retreat to this fortress..."},{"lineNumber":36227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、総統と皆さんの尽力により、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, thanks to the commander-in-chief and everyone's efforts,"},{"lineNumber":36228,"originalJapaneseLine":"　数体の魔人は撃破」","translatedEnglishLine":"several demons have been defeated."},{"lineNumber":36229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「また、リーザスより提供頂いたこの砦は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, this fortress provided by Leazas is"},{"lineNumber":36230,"originalJapaneseLine":"　堅牢かつ発見は困難。指揮系統は健在です。","translatedEnglishLine":"strong and difficult to detect. Our command system remains intact."},{"lineNumber":36231,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類は、まだ魔軍に敗北はしていません」","translatedEnglishLine":"Humanity has not yet been defeated by the demon army."},{"lineNumber":36232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「改めて言う事でもありませんが……","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it may be needless to say again..."},{"lineNumber":36233,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類史上、","translatedEnglishLine":"In human history,"},{"lineNumber":36234,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここまで魔軍に戦果を上げた記録はありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"there is no record of achieving such success against the demon army."},{"lineNumber":36235,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無事ではない国もあります。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are countries that are not safe."},{"lineNumber":36236,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかし、戦いはまだ、終わっていません。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the battle is not over yet."},{"lineNumber":36237,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いえ――――」","translatedEnglishLine":"No———"},{"lineNumber":36238,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今こそが、動く時です。","translatedEnglishLine":"Now is the time to act."},{"lineNumber":36239,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝つために。人類が、生き残るために」","translatedEnglishLine":"To win. For humanity to survive."},{"lineNumber":36240,"originalJapaneseLine":"鼓舞するようなウルザの言葉の裏には、","translatedEnglishLine":"Behind Ulza's encouraging words,"},{"lineNumber":36241,"originalJapaneseLine":"耐える戦いが限界に来ている事を示していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was the indication that the enduring battle had reached its limit."},{"lineNumber":36242,"originalJapaneseLine":"今は、善戦している国もある。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are countries that are currently fighting well."},{"lineNumber":36243,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、それは消耗がまだ決定的ではないからだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"But that is because their exhaustion is not yet decisive."},{"lineNumber":36244,"originalJapaneseLine":"無尽蔵の魔軍相手では、いずれ限界が来る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Against an inexhaustible demon army, eventually the limit will come."},{"lineNumber":36245,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうなれば、転がる石のように滅びの道を進むのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"If that happens, moving down the path of destruction like a rolling stone,"},{"lineNumber":36246,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰の目にも明白だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"is obvious to everyone."},{"lineNumber":36247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっふっふ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh heh heh...\""},{"lineNumber":36248,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつもの含み笑いを浮かべながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Wearing his usual smirk,"},{"lineNumber":36249,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがその後を継いで進み出た。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance stepped forward to continue."},{"lineNumber":36250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけで、状況はちっとだけ厳しい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, the situation is a little tough."},{"lineNumber":36251,"originalJapaneseLine":"　が、この俺様がウルトラスペシャルな作戦を","translatedEnglishLine":"But I, myself, have devised an ultra-special plan."},{"lineNumber":36252,"originalJapaneseLine":"　考えてやった。こいつで一発逆転だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"With this, we'll make a complete turnaround!\""},

{"lineNumber":36253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ、そいつは景気のいい話だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, that's an optimistic story."},

{"lineNumber":36254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「実現できれば、じゃがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"If it can be realized, that is."},

{"lineNumber":36255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「黙って聞け。これまでと変わらん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen quietly. It's no different from before."},

{"lineNumber":36256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴らは確かにちょろっと数が多くて強いが、","translatedEnglishLine":"They are indeed numerous and strong,"},

{"lineNumber":36257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　要はボスの命令を聞くだけの木偶の坊だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"but basically, they're just puppets who follow the boss's orders."},

{"lineNumber":36258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……そのボス、って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... that boss is...?"},

{"lineNumber":36259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう！　あのケイブリスの野郎だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes! That bastard Caeblis!"},

{"lineNumber":36260,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アイツをぶち殺せば俺たちの勝ちなのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If we kill him, we win!"},

{"lineNumber":36261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはそうだ。けど、あいつは魔物界の奥深くに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's true. But he's hiding deep within the demon world,"},

{"lineNumber":36262,"originalJapaneseLine":"　潜んでるし、正確な居場所は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so his exact location is..."},

{"lineNumber":36263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははは、そっちも抜かりはない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, we're not careless about that either."},

{"lineNumber":36264,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アールコートちゃん、カモン！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Arlcourt-chan, come on!"},

{"lineNumber":36265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、は、はい。失礼します……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, y-yes. Excuse me...\""},

{"lineNumber":36266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クレインさんが聞いてきてくださった内容を、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We have tracked and supplemented the investigation based on what Crane-san has inquired."},

{"lineNumber":36267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こちらで追跡、補足調査しました」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have conducted further tracking and supplementary investigation here."},

{"lineNumber":36268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私が、聞いたのは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What I heard was..."},

{"lineNumber":36269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ベズドグ山、タンザモンザツリー……","translatedEnglishLine":"Mount Bezudog, Tanzamonzatree..."},

{"lineNumber":36270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　という単語、だけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Those were the only words."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在、今以てなお、戦力差は圧倒的です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, even now, the difference in military strength is overwhelming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここが無事であっても、それ以外の国々は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if this place remains safe, other countries...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬軽くなった空気が、また地に沈んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere, which had briefly lightened, sank back down again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人レッドアイによりランス城は陥落し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Red Eye caused Rance Castle to fall,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この砦への撤退を余儀なくされましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we were forced to retreat to this fortress...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、総統と皆さんの尽力により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, thanks to the commander-in-chief and everyone's efforts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数体の魔人は撃破」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: several demons have been defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また、リーザスより提供頂いたこの砦は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, this fortress provided by Leazas is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堅牢かつ発見は困難。指揮系統は健在です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: strong and difficult to detect. Our command system remains intact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類は、まだ魔軍に敗北はしていません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity has not yet been defeated by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「改めて言う事でもありませんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it may be needless to say again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類史上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In human history,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで魔軍に戦果を上げた記録はありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there is no record of achieving such success against the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無事ではない国もあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are countries that are not safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、戦いはまだ、終わっていません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the battle is not over yet.
No———

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今こそが、動く時です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now is the time to act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つために。人類が、生き残るために」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To win. For humanity to survive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鼓舞するようなウルザの言葉の裏には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Behind Ulza's encouraging words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耐える戦いが限界に来ている事を示していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was the indication that the enduring battle had reached its limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は、善戦している国もある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are countries that are currently fighting well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、それは消耗がまだ決定的ではないからだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that is because their exhaustion is not yet decisive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無尽蔵の魔軍相手では、いずれ限界が来る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against an inexhaustible demon army, eventually the limit will come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうなれば、転がる石のように滅びの道を進むのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that happens, moving down the path of destruction like a rolling stone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰の目にも明白だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is obvious to everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっふっふ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh heh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもの含み笑いを浮かべながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wearing his usual smirk,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがその後を継いで進み出た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stepped forward to continue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、状況はちっとだけ厳しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, the situation is a little tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、この俺様がウルトラスペシャルな作戦を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I, myself, have devised an ultra-special plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えてやった。こいつで一発逆転だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, we'll make a complete turnaround!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ、そいつは景気のいい話だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, that's an optimistic story.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実現できれば、じゃがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it can be realized, that is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黙って聞け。これまでと変わらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen quietly. It's no different from before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らは確かにちょろっと数が多くて強いが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are indeed numerous and strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 要はボスの命令を聞くだけの木偶の坊だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but basically, they're just puppets who follow the boss's orders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……そのボス、って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... that boss is...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう！　あのケイブリスの野郎だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes! That bastard Caeblis!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アイツをぶち殺せば俺たちの勝ちなのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we kill him, we win!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはそうだ。けど、あいつは魔物界の奥深くに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's true. But he's hiding deep within the demon world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 潜んでるし、正確な居場所は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so his exact location is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは、そっちも抜かりはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, we're not careless about that either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アールコートちゃん、カモン！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arlcourt-chan, come on!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、は、はい。失礼します……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, y-yes. Excuse me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「クレインさんが聞いてきてくださった内容を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have tracked and supplemented the investigation based on what Crane-san has inquired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらで追跡、補足調査しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have conducted further tracking and supplementary investigation here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……私が、聞いたのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What I heard was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山、タンザモンザツリー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mount Bezudog, Tanzamonzatree...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という単語、だけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those were the only words.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

{"lineNumber":36253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ、そいつは景気のいい話だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, that's an optimistic story."},

{"lineNumber":36255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「黙って聞け。これまでと変わらん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen quietly. It's no different from before."},

{"lineNumber":36256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴らは確かにちょろっと数が多くて強いが、","translatedEnglishLine":"They are indeed numerous and strong,"},

{"lineNumber":36257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　要はボスの命令を聞くだけの木偶の坊だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"but basically, they're just puppets who follow the boss's orders."},

{"lineNumber":36262,"originalJapaneseLine":"　潜んでるし、正確な居場所は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so his exact location is..."},

{"lineNumber":36263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははは、そっちも抜かりはない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, we're not careless about that either."},

{"lineNumber":36264,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アールコートちゃん、カモン！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Arlcourt-chan, come on!"},

{"lineNumber":36265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、は、はい。失礼します……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, y-yes. Excuse me...\""},

{"lineNumber":36266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クレインさんが聞いてきてくださった内容を、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We have tracked and supplemented the investigation based on what Crane-san has inquired."},

{"lineNumber":36267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こちらで追跡、補足調査しました」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have conducted further tracking and supplementary investigation here."},

{"lineNumber":36268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私が、聞いたのは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What I heard was..."},

{"lineNumber":36269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ベズドグ山、タンザモンザツリー……","translatedEnglishLine":"Mount Bezudog, Tanzamonzatree..."},

{"lineNumber":36270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　という単語、だけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Those were the only words."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在、今以てなお、戦力差は圧倒的です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, even now, the difference in military strength is overwhelming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここが無事であっても、それ以外の国々は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if this place remains safe, other countries...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬軽くなった空気が、また地に沈んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere, which had briefly lightened, sank back down again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人レッドアイによりランス城は陥落し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Red Eye caused Rance Castle to fall,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この砦への撤退を余儀なくされましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we were forced to retreat to this fortress...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、総統と皆さんの尽力により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, thanks to the commander-in-chief and everyone's efforts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数体の魔人は撃破」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: several demons have been defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また、リーザスより提供頂いたこの砦は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, this fortress provided by Leazas is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堅牢かつ発見は困難。指揮系統は健在です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: strong and difficult to detect. Our command system remains intact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類は、まだ魔軍に敗北はしていません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity has not yet been defeated by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「改めて言う事でもありませんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it may be needless to say again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類史上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In human history,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで魔軍に戦果を上げた記録はありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there is no record of achieving such success against the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無事ではない国もあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are countries that are not safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、戦いはまだ、終わっていません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the battle is not over yet.
No———

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今こそが、動く時です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now is the time to act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つために。人類が、生き残るために」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To win. For humanity to survive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鼓舞するようなウルザの言葉の裏には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Behind Ulza's encouraging words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耐える戦いが限界に来ている事を示していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was the indication that the enduring battle had reached its limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は、善戦している国もある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are countries that are currently fighting well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、それは消耗がまだ決定的ではないからだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that is because their exhaustion is not yet decisive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無尽蔵の魔軍相手では、いずれ限界が来る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against an inexhaustible demon army, eventually the limit will come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうなれば、転がる石のように滅びの道を進むのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that happens, moving down the path of destruction like a rolling stone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰の目にも明白だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is obvious to everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっふっふ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh heh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもの含み笑いを浮かべながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wearing his usual smirk,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがその後を継いで進み出た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stepped forward to continue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、状況はちっとだけ厳しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, the situation is a little tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、この俺様がウルトラスペシャルな作戦を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I, myself, have devised an ultra-special plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えてやった。こいつで一発逆転だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With this, we'll make a complete turnaround!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ、そいつは景気のいい話だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, that's an optimistic story.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実現できれば、じゃがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it can be realized, that is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黙って聞け。これまでと変わらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen quietly. It's no different from before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らは確かにちょろっと数が多くて強いが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are indeed numerous and strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 要はボスの命令を聞くだけの木偶の坊だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but basically, they're just puppets who follow the boss's orders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……そのボス、って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... that boss is...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう！　あのケイブリスの野郎だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes! That bastard Caeblis!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アイツをぶち殺せば俺たちの勝ちなのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we kill him, we win!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはそうだ。けど、あいつは魔物界の奥深くに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's true. But he's hiding deep within the demon world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 潜んでるし、正確な居場所は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so his exact location is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは、そっちも抜かりはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, we're not careless about that either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アールコートちゃん、カモン！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arlcourt-chan, come on!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、は、はい。失礼します……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, y-yes. Excuse me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「クレインさんが聞いてきてくださった内容を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have tracked and supplemented the investigation based on what Crane-san has inquired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらで追跡、補足調査しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have conducted further tracking and supplementary investigation here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……私が、聞いたのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What I heard was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山、タンザモンザツリー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mount Bezudog, Tanzamonzatree...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という単語、だけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those were the only words.
